entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
